description: Danny Vox complains of another slow night at Addiction while Josh Weston fixes his stare on hung and stunning Brad Patton, who's playing around with Falcon superstar Marcus Iron. Soon Trent Austin and Jacob Hall get in on the action while Josh appreciates the view from afar. As the lusty studs slather each others stiff forms with attention, Josh is drawn into the action. Consumed by their lust, this quintet of sexual athletes push the boundaries of endurance as they suck rim and fuck their way into the overwhelming waves of orgasm.
title: Addiction, Part 2
